title: This Shark hair dryer is down to its lowest price ever in Amazon’s early Black Friday sale
author: carrie-ann-skinner
summary: Act now to get the Shark HyperAir IQ hair dryer for less
article: If you’re looking for a Black Friday hair dryer deal, then you’re in luck. Amazon has slashed 13% off the price of the Shark HyperAir IQ hair dryer, taking it down to just $199.99 from $229.99, as part of its early Black Friday sales. (Not in the US or UK? Scroll down for the best hair dryer deals in your region).

This is a new record-low price for the Shark HyperAir IQ hair dryer, which was launched in September this year, and which will automatically adjust the air speed and temperature when you connect one of its attachments to ensure you can create your desired style with minimal fuss

The hair dryer is currently in-stock and ready to ship, however, we recommend snapping up this deal sooner rather than later, as it has previously sold out very quickly and we don’t know how long this Black Friday deal will last.

The best hair dryers can be a costly purchase, so a good deal is always welcome, and this Black Friday deal is in stock and ready to ship. Previous deals on this model have sold out quickly, and we’re not sure if we’ll see a better offer on Black Friday or Cyber Monday, and due to the ongoing supply chain issues, so if you want to ensure that your hairdryer arrives in time for the party season we’d suggest snapping this deal up quickly.
